QuestData.Title: Easing into Lumberjacking
QuestData.Description: $G Sir:Ma'am;, we're going to need a lot of lumber if we're going to build this garrison into a suitable fortress. That means we're going to have to do a little work.$B$BWhile I certainly wouldn't ask you to dirty your hands with manual labor, I do need you to go out and find timber for our mill. Once you mark a tree a lumberjack will come chop it down and give you the timber.$B$BLet's give our lumberjacks a test run. There's a tree nearby!
QuestData.LogDescription: Harvest a Timber Sample from Small Timber and return it to Justin Timberlord.
QuestData.CompletionText: This garrison isn't going to build itself, commander! We need timber!
QuestData.RewardText: You're going to make a fine overseer, $g sir:ma'am;! Keep those lumberjacks in line!$B$BNow you know the basics of logging and finding timber. Time to put them to good use for the good of your garrison.
